meanings.definition: Arapaimas: a type of large freshwater fish native to South America.
meanings.sent1: In the Amazon River, arapaimas can grow very big.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen caught several arapaimas during their expedition.
meanings.sent3: The arapaimas in the pond were having a party, splashing around joyfully.
meanings.sent4: The arapaimas swam gracefully, like silver arrows in the water.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the arapaimas jumping out of the water was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Arapaimas: the plural form of arapaima, referring to more than one of these fish.
meanings.sent1: Let's study the arapaimas in the aquarium.
meanings.sent2: The arapaimas in the exhibit were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent3: The arapaimas decided to form a band and play underwater music.
meanings.sent4: The arapaimas in the tank moved together like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The school of arapaimas shimmered in the sunlight, a beautiful sight.
